Censorship is a real problem.

Everybody has the right to share information.

The Web can't deal with this problem.

But Bitcoin can.

We are building a bullhorn for the Internet.

Use it like Twitter to report what matters when it matters.

Bitcoin was designed for financial freedom.

It's transparent.

Every message is publicly auditable and authenticated.

It's distributed.

The peer-to-peer network has no single authority and functions on consensus alone.

It's immutable.

Messages stored in the blockchain cannot be edited or deleted.

We are using it for political freedom
